story.text: NEW YORK Jan 2 Henry Schein Inc. (HSIC.O), a health-care products and services company in North America and Europe, said on Tuesday that it will begin taking prebooking orders for 2007 seasonal influenza vaccine as of Jan. 3. Henry Schein expects to distribute about 20 million doses of the vaccine during 2007, including products manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline Plc (GSK.L), Novartis AG (NOVN.VX) and Sanofi-Aventis (SASY.PA).
story.title: henry schein says takes 2007 flu vaccine orders
